hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1500 6a and today's date is
February 24th 2018 and the top of the
episode is the next economic system
expands West will the u.s. joined the
new trade system now before I get
started I just want to make an
announcement I uploaded a new interview
with Harley schlanger it is on the x-22
Report spotlight YouTube channel so all
you need to do is go to youtube type in
X 20 to report spotlight or you can come
over to the X 20 to report comm site or
news sentinel comm site and all you need
to do is scroll down a little bit look
over to your right hand side you'll see
the interview there you can play it
right on the site or go to steam it
that's steam accom /at x 20 to report
and you can watch the interview right on
steam it let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now we can see
the central bankers they are not letting
up on demonizing cryptocurrencies and we
need to understand this is how the
establishment works they first come out
and they put out a message where they
tell you how bad something is and they
keep repeating it over and over and over
to make you convinced that it is bad and
I hear people around the street saying
oh you don't want to touch Bitcoin you
don't want to do that and they laugh
about Bitcoin they laugh about the
cryptocurrencies just like people
laughed about the internet when it was
first being developed people didn't
understand it they didn't know what it
was gonna be used for they had no clue
and then all of a sudden everyone was
using it the same things happening with
cryptocurrencies people hear things on
the corporate media but they really
don't understand what it really is now
out of the Wall Street Journal they put
up an article where they're saying that
terrorists are using Bitcoin for
anonymous donations and they're making
this whole entire case that terrorist
groups are beginning to take advantage
of the anonymity of cryptocurrency to
raise funds to carry out attacks
according to the report terror
organizations such as the North Syrian
military group
used Twitter to encourage supporters to
donate cryptocurrency anonymously and
they keep going on and on about this
saying that yes the blockchain is made
up of Ledger's and people can stay
anonymous and they're using this type of
function to support their terror
activities and they never really
mentioned that cash is also used for
this banks are also laundering money
there's already been cases against HSBC
terror organizations crime syndicates
have been using cash all along to push
their criminal activities so their case
doesn't really make sense but what
they're trying to say is that the
blockchain system without relying on the
banks or exchanges or some type of
entity that's centrally controlled
you're going to have this type of
problem now they're doing this on
purpose because they realize how quickly
this can move and really take over the
currency system that's what they're
really worried about now think about
this us Olympians they've turned to
Bitcoin to offset their competition
related costs because everything costs a
lot of money they realized if they
invest in Bitcoin Bitcoin has been going
up yes it's come down a little bit and
it goes right back up they can make some
money and they can use this to offset
some of their costs and we see right now
the luge team out in the current
Olympics they've been using Bitcoin to
basically allow them to do all the
things they need to do to get to the
Olympics and we see right now we have
individuals corporations countries all
moving to the crypto market the reason
for this is because they realize how
easy it is to establish I mean think
about everyone has a computer a everyone
pretty much has a some type of
smartphone if you're doing any type of
banking most of the people use a
smartphone they use a computer or ready
to do their banking
and that's all you need because once you
join up to an exchange all you need to
do is take your phone everywhere to pay
for things even online you can pay for
things using your computer or your phone
and you don't really need to make that
many different adjustments to move to
this new crypto system plus companies
they really don't have to spend that
much money to bring on the crypto system
the blockchain to join the blockchain
and to accept payments it's really not
that difficult and the central bankers
they realize this and they understand
that if this takes off which it is it's
going to happen very very quickly
remember the system is coming down
remember the system right now is dead
the entire system is deteriorating very
very quickly and when Trump comes out
and he tells you about you know the
infrastructure tells you about all these
different things everyone is still
thinking that he's doing this for the
current system he is not I mean the
corporate media continually is you know
looking at what he's doing with his tax
reform and all this stuff and they're
comparing it and using it saying all
this is not going to help the current
system this is not gonna do anything
with the current system this is gonna
damage the current system he's not doing
it for the current system you need to
step back a little bit and understand
that he is doing this for the next
system and everything that he's doing
right now has nothing to do with the
system that were in today I mean we can
see there are so many different
indicators out there right now I mean
the credit markets they are flashing red
right now and if people you know those
who don't understand what that means is
bond spreads well that's an economic
indicator in terms of business cycles
widening spreads indicate a slowing
economy since companies are more likely
to default in a slowing economy the
credit risk related to their bond Rises
for this reason investors command
additional interest on corporate bonds
now in the last few days we've seen an
ominous reawakening in the credit
markets
where we're starting to see these
spreads start to widen and we see the
European credit spreads or back to near
cycle wides we also see it in the United
States the same exact thing and this is
another indicator to let us know
something is going on Trump right now
his administration is looking to clarify
the rules which govern whether a person
can discharge student loans in
bankruptcy and we see right now that
they're looking at this and the only way
to do it is if your bank rip if you show
hardship right now you can readjust your
student loans and what we need to
understand that nearly 40% of student
loan borrowers from the mid-2000s
they're gonna be defaulting by 2023 this
is according to Brookings and this is a
huge problem now people are saying that
the job market is absolutely fine if
it's absolutely fine why are all these
individuals going to default on their
student loans because they're not
getting the high paying jobs or a lot of
them can't even find jobs when they come
out of school now
Brookings released another study
revealing that most borrowers who left
school owing at least fifty thousand in
student loans in 2010 had failed to pay
down any of their debt four years later
and we can see right now
those with floating rate loans the pool
of those drowning in debt will only get
worse as the Fed continues to hike
interest rates and this is a no-win
situation remember I think where we're
headed here and from all the actions is
to write off all this debt get rid of
the central bank to move us to a brand
new system what is that new system well
I do believe it's going to involve
crypto currencies I do believe that it's
going to be the belt and road system and
I know the central bank's behind the
scenes which they're really never
mentioned they want their system they
want their currency to be issued around
the world they want a fiat currency
system that they can control they're
gonna make it seem fantastic in the
beginning they're gonna back it with
gold or you know give confidence to the
system with gold
to say that you know we're on the petrol
you one or whatever they're gonna do use
STRs but they don't want anyone using
the cryptosystem because that they have
no control over the only way they can
have control over it is if governments
passed laws and they say yes this is the
currency you need to use this is the
coin that you need to use and every
person needs to use it and it will be
issued by the central bank that is the
only way and if they get governments to
do this yes we are then screwed but we
can see right now China's New Silk Road
trading system which is out throughout
Asia moving into Africa moving into
Europe it is now reached Latin America
and we can see right now Beijing is
turbocharging its infrastructure
connectivity across the region and the
Korea and the Caribbean and they're
looking at all these different countries
and these countries well they're
starting to join up now a shift took
place last month in Chile and there was
a forum of individuals that got together
China and through 33 member community of
Latin America and Caribbean states all
got together and they started to discuss
the belton road and we can see right now
that countries like Brazil Argentina
Chile Peru and many other many others
they're joining the belt in road and
this is not only because China imports
commodities such as iron ore soy corn
and all that the reason they're going to
be joining is because they've been
beginning investment dollars from the
Asian infrastructure investment bank and
the lending will increase and we can see
right now that Latin American countries
they're moving away from the United
States the approval of u.s. foreign
policy in Latin America was around 49%
it is dropped to 24% and we can see
right now that the belton road this is
the new trading system this is the
future of trade and we can see already
that China is putting a lot of money
into this system a lot of countries are
joining up
and they're not being forced to they're
giving the proposal they're gonna get
money to do what they need to do to join
to build the infrastructure meanwhile
the united states they're stuck the
united states cannot offer these
countries anything the only thing they
had to offer was the TPP and back then
the offer wasn't that great that's why
it was shot down by so many different
countries because they realized they
wanted to control the countries or the
court system that laid above the
government's so if the government you
know wanted to do something that court
system could reject it china and russia
they're not doing that they're allowing
the countries to be independent you're
just joining a trade system and they
want it to be a win-win type of
situation I think Trump has been talking
to J Jinping because what they really
want to do in the background of what is
all going on right now is to join this
new trade system because he realizes
that we need to build our infrastructure
here that's why he put forth the
infrastructure bill it's not for today's
system it's not because he's gonna you
know all of a sudden take what we have
today and rebuild it and we're gonna
become a manufacturing powerhouse he's
rebuilding the infrastructure bringing
back as much manufacturing as they
possibly can to the country preparing
the country for a transition into a
brand-new system this is why I don't
think he cares about writing off the
debt remember he's a master of
bankruptcy he understands when something
needs to completely go away and it has
to be reborn this is what we're seeing
right now he realizes and he knows all
the stats just like we do the country is
in big big trouble now imagine if he
tell the population that were bankrupt
we have nothing the country we're
keeping it alive by manipulating all the
statistics actually the whole thing is
fake the country would implode right now
and he wouldn't be able to do anything
so what he's doing right now is using
their system using their
techniques to build and to prepare the
country for a transition into a brand
new system and that's why he keeps
saying let's make America great again
and this is exactly what he is doing he
is bringing us to the next level now the
central bankers on the other hand they
want the system to be moved to their new
system and they don't care what happens
to the country they can care less
because this is their garbage system
right now they don't care about it they
know it's dead in the water they just
don't want to be blamed for it because
then they can't set up shop someplace
else they don't care if it comes down
hard they don't care how many people are
ruined it makes no difference to them so
here we are there is a transition headed
our way there's a new trade system the
question is when will the u.s. join when
will it happen
I think as we're going through the
transition at that time the announcement
will be made that we need to join
China's belt and Road and everyone in
Congress and everyone around they won't
be able to say anything because this
will be the only alternative at this
point and we could see that time is
coming very very quickly and we're gonna
have to be ready for this because we're
gonna go through a period of time
depending on how this all plays out
where we're gonna be transitioning into
something completely different which
means the credit markets most likely
going to freeze up we'll probably oil
shortages unless we use whatever we have
here in the States and I think that's
what they've been preparing for we're
gonna see that people are going to be
losing a lot of their wealth things that
we thought that we had that's going to
completely disappear
a lot of that debt is going to disappear
as we move to a brand new system so you
need to be ready and prepared and you
need to protect yourself how do you
protect yourself well you can invest in
crypto currencies you can also have gold
and silver because that is going to
increase in value and you're going to be
able to use this to maybe purchase the
cryptocurrency purchase the new currency
you also need food
supplies because as inflation hits
because as we know it's going to hit
because the dollars going to lose value
very very quickly and we're gonna see
the credit markets freeze there's gonna
be a lot less on the shelves just like
when we came off of the system the gold
system back in the 70s and we're moving
on to the petro dollar system there was
a little bit of turmoil during that
period where there were gas lines jobs
nobody could find a job at that time yes
interest rates were very high because
they started to print a lot of money
currency I should say and we can see
right now that was a small hiccup this
is gonna be a little bit larger because
we're coming off this reserve currency
and we will no longer be the reserve
currency so things are going to change
rapidly and this is what you need to be
prepared for listen everyone thanks a
lot for listening be well be safe and
especially be prepared thanks a lot
